EmailTemplate.name: Protecting Your QA Documents from Legal Discovery.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Live Webinar: Protecting Your QA Documents from Legal Discovery with Steve Wirth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare ReformAnything you Write Will be Used Against You: Protecting Your QA Documents from Legal Discovery Register for a Complimentary Live Webinar on May 31
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}},
Join Page, Wolfberg and Wirth's Steve Wirth <http://pwwemslaw.com/> and TriTech Senior Product Manager, Charlie Barry as they provide both a legal and software perspectives of patient care documentation and the legal “ins and outs” of “peer review” and QA programs to maximize legal protection while minimizing the risk of discovery of documents used in this essential process.
Thursday, May 31 2:00PM ET | 1:00PM CT | Noon MT | 11:00AM PT
REGISTER: <http://offers.tritech.com/May31Webinar.html>
If you are unable to view the Register button above, please copy and paste the following URL into any web browser: http://offers.tritech.com/May31Webinar.html
